name: The Cube Of Astra: Play
description:
The game focuses on a first person shooter, allowing you the gunslinger to locate the cube in a maze. The game involves a bit of horror.

CONTROLS:

W - FORWARD

S - BACKWARD

A - LEFT

D - RIGHT

E - SLOW TIME

MOUSE WHEEL - TOGGLE LANTERN(LAMP)

DOWNLOADABLE VERSION INCLUDES MORE CONTENT!!!!

HERE: https://overtold.itch.io/the-cube-of-astradownloadable
